shortdesc.ph: A styleguide defines look & feel as well as writing style and aims to produce a consistent presentation throughout all information.

body.p: The most visible aspect of the styleguide is usually the look and feel of the documents and the website of a company.
Language, style, standardization of terminology are less visible parts of the house style but are equally important for a consistent user experience.

During the workshop we will:
Establish the relevant elements of language, style, standardization of terminology next to the fonts and page design. The workshop hints on the processes to adhere to the house style.
During the workshop we will use a content impact model to ensure all aspects are covered.
